article_title: Fire Destroys Sperry Mobile Home - NewsOn6.com - Tulsa, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports - KOTV.com
article_text:
Sperry firefighters battled a mobile home fire Friday morning.

The Sperry Fire Department responded to the fire in the 1300 block of East 86th Street North just before 9 a.m. It called for mutual aid from the Tulsa Fire Department.

The fire destroyed the home. Firefighters say no one was home and no one was injured.

The cause of the fire is under investigation.

Sperry firefighters battled a mobile home fire Friday morning.
The Sperry Fire Department responded to the fire in the 1300 block of East 86th Street North just before 9 a.m.
Firefighters say no one was home and no one was injured.
It called for mutual aid from the Tulsa Fire Department.
The cause of the fire is under investigation.
